remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法會設定旗標設為`true`。Calling the method sets the flag to `true`. 呼叫方法設定至`false`。Calling the method on an sets to `false`. 如果相關端包含在查詢路徑中，也可能會載入 或 。An or may also be loaded if the related end is included in the query path. 如需有關範圍的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information about span, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). `Load`方法並載入相關物件資料來源是否是`true`。The `Load` method on and loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`. 當物件中斷連結時，旗標已從`false`至`true`。When an object is detached, the flag is changed from `false` to `true`. 若要確保相關的端是完全載入之前進行處理，您應該檢查是否是`false`。To guarantee that a related end is fully loaded before doing processing, you should check whether is `false`. 如果已`false`，您應該呼叫方法。If is `false`, you should call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設合併選項為 (適用於追蹤的物件) 或 (當物件並未在 中追蹤時)。The default merge option is for tracked objects or when the object is not tracked in the . 若要指定合併選項以外，呼叫`Load`方法或針對採用特定參數。To specify a merge option other than , call the `Load` method on the or the that takes a specific parameter. 呼叫方法會設定旗標設為`true`。Calling the method sets the flag to `true`. 方法會載入相關的物件資料來源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 都會覆寫這個方法來載入相關物件。Both and override this method to load related objects. `Load` 會呼叫來從導覽屬性所公開的相關端中明確載入相關的物件。`Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). 呼叫方法會設定旗標設為`true`。Calling the method sets the flag to `true`. 方法會載入相關的物件資料來源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`. 預設合併選項為 (適用於追蹤的物件) 或 (當物件並未在 中追蹤時)。The default merge option is for tracked objects or when the object is not tracked in the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SourceRoleName As String
public: property System::String ^ SourceRoleName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.

span.span: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.
A that is the role name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色名稱由`Role`屬性的`End`概念模型中定義此關聯性的關聯中的項目。The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Association 項目 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41). ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，這由產生[Entity Data Model 精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5). 下列範例會將新`SalesOrderHeader`實體`Contact`實體。The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然後，它會取得所有相關的端從`Contact`實體並顯示關聯性名稱、 來源角色名稱和每個相關端的目標角色名稱。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果來源實體物件附加至快取，則所有已連線的端點會新增至物件快取，而且其對應的關聯性也會新增至。If the source entity object is attached to a cache, then all the connected ends are added to the object cache and their corresponding relationships are also added to the . 也固定的關聯性。The of the relationship is also fixed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果相關的端已經附加到其某些實體，就會合併現有的實體與新的實體。If the related end already has some entities attached to it, the existing entities will be merged with the new entity. 新的實體不會被視為相關的實體物件的完整集合。The new entity is not assumed to be the complete set of related entity objects. 來源實體物件和所有傳入的實體物件必須位於或狀態。The source entity object and all entity objects passed in must be in an or state. 只有在狀態管理員已經在追蹤關聯性執行個體時，才允許刪除的項目。Deleted elements are allowed only when the state manager is already tracking the relationship instance.
